entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 7:44 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
